snippet: About $500 million is planned for a classic venture capital fund and about $1.5 billion for a vehicle earmarked for later-stage “growth” investments.
abstract: Venture capital firm Accel is set to announce it has raised about $2 billion for its two newest investment funds.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: About $500 million is planned for a classic venture capital fund and about $1.5 billion for a vehicle earmarked for later-stage “growth” investments.

headline.main: Accel Raises $2 Billion to Invest in Start-Ups
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Accel Raises $2 Billion for New Investment Funds
